title: Vanished
occurrences: They were there. I looked - and then they vanished.
They were there and then they vanished! I've looked and they're gone.
At 4:59 Eastern time, millions of people literally vanished off the face of the Earth,
Millions have instantly vanished, yet you have been left behind.

who have vanished off the face of the Earth.
